components.name: Core API
components.description: Handles message passing, event-driven agents, and supports both local and distributed runtimes.

components.name: AgentChat API
components.description: Provides a simplified API for rapid prototyping of multi-agent interactions, built on top of the Core API.

components.name: Extensions API
components.description: Allows for the integration of first- and third-party extensions, enhancing the framework's capabilities with specific implementations of LLM clients.

components.name: AutoGen Studio
components.description: A no-code GUI tool for prototyping and running multi-agent workflows, making it accessible for non-developers.

data_flows.description: User inputs are sent from the AutoGen Studio to the AgentChat API for processing and agent interaction.
The AgentChat API communicates with the Core API to utilize its message passing and event-driven capabilities.
The Core API can invoke extensions through the Extensions API to enhance agent functionalities.

trust_boundaries.name: User Interaction Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the user interface and the backend services.

trust_boundaries.name: API Communication Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between different API layers ensuring secure communication.
